column3: Wear with pride. New Balance sneakers labeled "Made in the USA" are built by American workers in one of our New England factories.Manufactured in the US for over 75 years and representing a limited portion of our US sales, New Balance Made is a premium collection that contains a domestic value of 70% or greater.
Your go-to strategy for confident everyday style includes the men's 574 with its iconic look and supportive ENCAP midsole cushioning.

Described as “a running shoe on spikes,” the 3000v3 incorporates REVlite foam for comfort close to the foot. The upper mixes an innovative combo of materials to provide support, breathability and protection.
A lightweight upper meets soft cushioning technology for superior comfort that elevates your everyday look with modern sport style.
This collector's edition offers a clean and classic profile and ENCAP cushioning technology to help you meet every day with confidence.
The 4040v4 molded cleat is built with amazing mid-foot support, low profile cleats for superior grip and strategically-placed cushioning to make your game almost effortless.
Built for playing stability, this premium baseball shoe provides superior comfort for a consistent feel from turf to cleat so that your game stays on-point.
The men’s 860v8 engineered mesh on the upper is thoughtfully designed for lightweight breathability and freedom of movement.
Freeze your defender in the NB Freeze cleat. Quixrail delivers superior traction with lugs designed to mirror the cuts taken by lacrosse athletes.
In addition to the advanced cushioning built into the midsole, this men's running shoe also ships with an Ortholite insert to add an extra layer of support.
The 4040v4 metal cleat is built with amazing mid-foot support, low profile cleats for superior grip and strategically-placed cushioning to make your game almost effortless.
Whether you're at a full sprint or standing still, the COMPv1 men's baseball cleat offers the comfort and support you need to give the game your all.

Developed for all-day comfort, the New Balance 928 men’s walking shoe offers industry-leading motion control and superior stability thanks to our ROLLBAR and Walking Strike Path technologies. Add to that ABZORB midfoot cushioning, a seamless Phantom Liner and an odor-resistant treatment and you've got a shoe that can take you from 9 to 5 to whenever.
As always, you can expect a secure fit thanks to no-sew overlays. Striking materials and colors give this iteration next-level aesthetics.
As your intensity increases, you can rely on the support of the external heel clip, the traction of the Vibram® outsole, and the comfort of the breathable synthetic/mesh upper.
Leather laces round out the premium classic look.
Your go-to strategy for confident everyday style includes the men's 574 with its iconic look and supportive ENCAP midsole cushioning.

Some would say that the New Balance 624 cross-trainer couldn't get any better. And they would be wrong. Presenting the updated 624 with increased flexibility, enhanced cushioning and even wider widths than ever before (4E and 6E). Tech specs include an EVA footbed, IMEVA (Injection Molded EVA foam), ABZORB® cushioning, internal shank and our lightweight Phantom Liner.
Durable construction and ultra-comfortable midsole cushioning are sure to make this men's sneaker your go-to favorite.

Described as “a running shoe on spikes,” the 3000v3 incorporates REVlite foam for comfort close to the foot. The upper mixes an innovative combo of materials to provide support, breathability and protection.
The Minimus 20v7 men's trainer delivers advanced comfort and ground feel, so you can keep your focus on crushing your goals.
Featuring a lightweight and flexible mesh upper and advanced midsole cushioning, the FRESH FOAM LAZR Sport provides uncompromising performance for athletes on the move.
For an athletic look backed by superior performance, this men's sneaker is sure to land in your starting lineup day after day.
For more comfort on the trail, the NB Response 2.0 Performance Insert helps support your step with a molded arch and heel.
